catalog_info.title: Intermediate Babylonian
catalog_info.notes: This is an indivisible year-long course. Students must complete both terms of this course (parts A and B) within the same academic year in order to receive credit.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Akkadian grammar, basic vocabulary, knowledge of cuneiform script. Akkadian 120A/120B is an indivisible year-long course. Students must complete both terms of this course (parts A and B) within the same academic year in order to receive credit.
catalog_info.description: Students must complete both terms of this course (parts A and B) within the same academic year in order to receive credit.
